title: Plat 3 Supp LF Plat 2 + ADC
body:
Plat 2 Supp LF Plat 1 + ADC

Basically looking for a consistent duo partner with  a microphone and a decent champion pool. 
Preferably on most nights.
Mains are Janna, Thresh, Morgana but play all the other supports well.
Add me in game on Scyther Bot      for more info or to play =]
